descriptionMdByRank.1: Increases Energy Regen by **12.8%**. When Outro Skill is released, increases the switched-in Resonator's ATK by **10%**, stacking up to 1 time(s). This effect lasts for 14s.
descriptionMdByRank.2: Increases Energy Regen by **16%**. When Outro Skill is released, increases the switched-in Resonator's ATK by **12.5%**, stacking up to 1 time(s). This effect lasts for 14s.
descriptionMdByRank.3: Increases Energy Regen by **19.2%**. When Outro Skill is released, increases the switched-in Resonator's ATK by **15%**, stacking up to 1 time(s). This effect lasts for 14s.
descriptionMdByRank.4: Increases Energy Regen by **22.4%**. When Outro Skill is released, increases the switched-in Resonator's ATK by **17.55%**, stacking up to 1 time(s). This effect lasts for 14s.
descriptionMdByRank.5: Increases Energy Regen by **25.6%**. When Outro Skill is released, increases the switched-in Resonator's ATK by **20%**, stacking up to 1 time(s). This effect lasts for 14s.
